name: Lenny Bruce
genre: Satire/Political satire, Black comedy, Improvisational comedy
subject: American culture, American politics, race relations, religion, human sexuality, obscenity, stand-up comedians
influenced: Richard Pryor, George Carlin, Nick Di Paolo, Sam Kinison, Eddie Izzard, Bill Hicks, Lewis Black, Jon Stewart, Rich Vos
notable_work: ''The Lenny Bruce Originals'',  ''The Carnegie Hall Concert'',  ''How to Talk Dirty and Influence People''
